languages.text: "Брызги горячей крови на лице, клинок нежно пронзает плоть, жертва трепещет в твоих руках... Разве это не будоражит твои чувства, убийца?"
"Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"
languages.original_text: "Брызги горячей крови на лице, клинок нежно пронзает плоть, жертва трепещет в твоих руках... Разве это не будоражит твои чувства, убийца?"

traits.locale_text: "The spatters of hot blood on your face, the blade gently sinking into the flesh, the prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

"Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

languages.text: "Heiße Blutspritzer auf Eurem Gesicht, eine Klinge, die sanft im Fleisch versinkt, Beute, die in Euren Händen zittert ... Stimuliert das nicht Eure Sinne, Schlächter?"
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

traits.locale_text: "Heiße Blutspritzer auf Eurem Gesicht, eine Klinge, die sanft im Fleisch versinkt, Beute, die in Euren Händen zittert ... Stimuliert das nicht Eure Sinne, Schlächter?"

languages.text: « Le sang chaud qui gicle sur votre visage, une lame qui s'enfonce doucement dans la chair, votre proie qui tremble entre vos mains... Tout cela ne vous taquine-t-il pas les sens, tueuse ? »
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

traits.locale_text: « Le sang chaud qui gicle sur votre visage, une lame qui s'enfonce doucement dans la chair, votre proie qui tremble entre vos mains... Tout cela ne vous taquine-t-il pas les sens, tueuse ? »

languages.text: «Manchas de sangre caliente en la cara, tu hoja clavándose en carne, la presa temblando en tus manos... ¿No te resulta estimulante, asesina?».
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

traits.locale_text: «Manchas de sangre caliente en la cara, tu hoja clavándose en carne, la presa temblando en tus manos... ¿No te resulta estimulante, asesina?».

languages.text: 「顔に飛び散る熱い血、優しく肉に食い込む刃、手の中で震える獲物…。感覚が刺激されないだろうか、殺し屋よ？」
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

traits.locale_text: 「顔に飛び散る熱い血、優しく肉に食い込む刃、手の中で震える獲物…。感覚が刺激されないだろうか、殺し屋よ？」

languages.text: “鲜血溅到脸上，利刃轻轻刺入肉体，猎物在你手里颤抖……这一切真的不会让你愉悦不已吗，杀手？”
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

traits.locale_text: “鲜血溅到脸上，利刃轻轻刺入肉体，猎物在你手里颤抖……这一切真的不会让你愉悦不已吗，杀手？”

languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"

languages.text: "Yüzüne yeni dökülen kan sıçrar, kılıç nazikçe ete dalar, avın ellerinde tir tir titrer... Tüm bunlar, hislerini kamçılamıyor mu ölüm saçan?"
languages.original_text: "Spatters of hot blood on your face, a blade sinking gently into flesh, prey trembling in your hands... Does it not stimulate your senses, slayer?"
